resources.string: Administrator description: additional privileges to prevent uninstallation.

This service helps to block access to specified websites to minimize distractions and enhance productivity by monitoring and blocking browser activity. No sensitive information is being accessed or stored.

"Strict Mode is a powerful feature designed to provide an extra layer of protection against distractions. It's perfect for those moments when you might be tempted to turn off your blockers but need help staying focused.

" "When activated, Strict Mode prevents you from removing blockers, unmarking blocked apps, or disabling blockers. Additionally, you won’t be able to access your settings or uninstall the app while Strict Mode is active.

" "Please note that once you enable Strict Mode, you won't be able to turn it off until the timer runs out. Make sure to double-check that you've set the timer correctly before proceeding."

"Hi there! Strict mode requires admin permissions for the features below to work properly:

" "1. **Focus Mode**: Strict mode is designed to keep you on track by blocking distractions. You won't be able to turn off the blockers, which helps you stay focused on your tasks, and prevents temptation.

" "2. **Uninstall Protection**: Prevents you from uninstalling the app.

" "3. **No Force Stops**: Stops you from force-stopping the app.

" "Admin permissions are only used to ensure that strict mode works. No sensitive information is being accessed, or shared."

"Hey there! We want to be transparent about the permissions the app uses. This app requires the permissions PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS, QUERY_ALL_PACKAGES. Here's what they do:

" "1. **PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS**: This permission allows the app to view your app usage statistics, which helps identify and block distracting apps to improve your productivity.

" "2. **QUERY_ALL_PACKAGES**: This permission lets the app query and get information about all the apps installed on your device. This is necessary to identify and manage the apps you want to block.

" "We understand that some users might find this level of access invasive. However, the app only uses these permissions to help you stay productive by blocking apps and notifications you mark as distractions. The app does not access, share, or save any sensitive information.

" + "It's understandable if you're uncomfortable granting these permissions. However, the app cannot work without them. If you prefer not to use these features, you can close the app and uninstall it. We appreciate your understanding!"
This permission allows the app to monitor which apps are being used. It is needed for detecting and blocking specific apps according to user settings.
This permission allows the app to display information or warnings over other apps. It is needed for blocking access to specific apps by showing a blocking screen.
This permission allows the app to run continuously without being stopped by battery optimization settings. This makes sure the app can monitor and block apps at all times.
This permission allows the app to listen to and interact with your notifications. It is necessary for blocking notifications from distracting apps.
This permission allows the app to monitor and block websites you mark as distracting in your blockers.

"Hello there! It seems that you've turned off the accessibility permission for this app. This app uses the accessibility permission to keep you out of the apps you've blocked and to ensure you don't get distracted. Fortunately, the app has a backup prevention mode for this situation, which you cannot turn off, but it is much stricter. For example, if strict mode is enabled, you won't be able to access your settings at all, compared to just settings related to this app, and all browsers are blocked. I highly encourage you to re-enable the permission for a better experience.\n" "If the settings are blocked, you can use the shortcut you used to disable the accessibility permission."
